body: 这个画风。。。没有看下去的动力

Just a personal opinion and reference for people who check comments for storyline...?

 Story line: cliche incest story, nice plot progression (not rushed and logical), 7/10 

Art: T H I C C but face and boobs are SERIOUSLY lacking, 2/10 



Total: 9/20
as eruka07 said, the plot looks good even tho the art is not that good
I know that graphic was worst, that's true, but believe me, this plot is nice for incest lover
